Title: 1. The Lion King
Description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

Title: 2. Forrest Gump
Description: The history of the United States from the 1950s to the '70s unfolds from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, who yearns to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

Title: 3. True Lies
Description: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used-car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States.

Title: 4. The Santa Clause
Description: When a man inadvertently makes Santa fall off his roof on Christmas Eve, he finds himself magically recruited to take his place.

Title: 5. The Flintstones
Description: In a parallel modern-day Stone Age world, a working-class family, the Flintstones, are set up for an executive job. But they learn that money can't buy happiness.

Title: 6. Dumb and Dumber
Description: After a woman leaves a briefcase at the airport terminal, a dumb limo driver and his dumber friend set out on a hilarious cross-country road trip to Aspen to return it.

Title: 7. Clear and Present Danger
Description: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

Title: 8. Speed
Description: A young Los Angeles Police Department (LAPD) Special Weapons And Tactics (SWAT) officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

Title: 9. The Mask
Description: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

Title: 10. Pulp Fiction
Description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

Title: 11. Interview with the Vampire
Description: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

Title: 12. Maverick
Description: Bret Maverick, needing money for a poker tournament, faces various comic mishaps and challenges, including a charming woman thief.

Title: 13. The Client
Description: A young boy who witnessed the suicide of a mafia lawyer hires an attorney to protect him when the District Attorney tries to use him to take down a mob family.

Title: 14. Disclosure
Description: A computer specialist is sued for sexual harassment by a former lover turned boss who initiated the act forcefully, which threatens both his career and his personal life.

Title: 15. Star Trek: Generations
Description: With the help of long presumed dead Captain Kirk, Captain Picard must stop a deranged scientist willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter a space matrix.

Title: 16. Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
Description: A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of the missing mascot of the Miami Dolphins.

Title: 17. Stargate
Description: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

Title: 18. Legends of the Fall
Description: In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

Title: 19. Wolf
Description: Publisher Will Randall becomes a demon wolf and has to fight to keep his job.

Title: 20. The Specialist
Description: A woman entices a bomb expert she's involved with into destroying the mafia that killed her family.

Title: 21. Four Weddings and a Funeral
Description: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

Title: 22. The Little Rascals
Description: Alfalfa is wooing Darla and his "He-Man-Woman-Hating" friends attempt to sabotage the relationship.

Title: 23. Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult
Description: Frank Drebin comes out of retirement to help Police Squad infiltrate a gang of terrorists planning to detonate a bomb at the Academy Awards.

Title: 24. The Crow
Description: The night before his wedding, musician Eric Draven and his fianc√©e are brutally murdered by members of a violent gang. On the anniversary of their death, Eric rises from the grave and assumes the mantle of the Crow, a supernatural avenger.

Title: 25. Natural Born Killers
Description: Two victims of traumatized childhoods become lovers and psychopathic serial murderers irresponsibly glorified by the mass media.

Title: 26. Angels in the Outfield
Description: When a boy prays for a chance to have a family if the California Angels win the pennant, angels are assigned to make that possible.

Title: 27. Little Women
Description: Jo struggles for independence and sometimes clashes with her beloved mother and sisters Meg, Amy and Beth. She also contends with their cranky Aunt March, their impulsive neighbor Laurie and kindly linguistics professor Friedrich Bhaer.

Title: 28. When a Man Loves a Woman
Description: The seemingly perfect relationship between a man and his wife is tested as a result of her alcoholism.

Title: 29. The River Wild
Description: Rafting expert Gail takes on a pair of armed killers while navigating a spectacularly violent river.

Title: 30. D2: The Mighty Ducks
Description: Can Gordon's team win the Junior Goodwill Games in California in spite of all the set-backs?

Title: 31. Timecop
Description: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

Title: 32. City Slickers II: The Legend of Curly's Gold
Description: One year after their first adventure, Mitch Robbins and his friends discover a treasure map that belonged to their late trail guide Curly and they set out to discover its secrets.

Title: 33. The Jungle Book
Description: Rudyard Kipling's classic tale of Mowgli, the orphaned jungle boy raised by wild animals, and how he becomes king of the jungle.

Title: 34. Beverly Hills Cop III
Description: Axel Foley, while investigating a car theft ring, comes across something much bigger than that: the same men who killed his boss are running a counterfeit money ring out of a theme park in Los Angeles.

Title: 35. Nobody's Fool
Description: A stubborn man past his prime reflects on his life of strict independence and seeks more from himself.

Title: 36. The Paper
Description: New York City tabloid editor Henry's faced with tough decisions while he faces several serious life challenges, and a tempting job offer.

Title: 37. On Deadly Ground
Description: A blowout firefighter takes on an environmentally destructive oil corporation by causing many deaths and explosions in Alaska.

Title: 38. Richie Rich
Description: Richie Rich is the richest kid in the world. The one thing Richie doesn't have is friends. When his parents suddenly go missing, Richie hooks up with a group of kids who just might fill the void in his life, while helping save his folks.

Title: 39. It Could Happen to You
Description: A police officer promises to share his lottery ticket with a waitress in lieu of a tip.

Title: 40. Junior
Description: As part of a fertility research project, a male scientist agrees to carry a pregnancy in his own body.

Title: 41. Nell
Description: In a remote woodland cabin, a small-town doctor discovers Nell - a beautiful young hermit-woman with many secrets.

Title: 42. Street Fighter
Description: In the midst of a civil war in South East Asia, a general intensifies the climate of violence by kidnapping 63 UN delegates. To free the hostages, a colonel leads a group of fighters, who will have to use all their skills to be successful.

Title: 43. The Shadow
Description: In 1930s New York City, The Shadow (Alec Baldwin) battles his nemesis, Shiwan Khan (John Lone), who is building an atomic bomb.

Title: 44. I Love Trouble
Description: Peter Brackett and Sabrina Peterson are two competing Chicago newspaper reporters who join forces to unravel the mystery behind a train derailment.

Title: 45. Major League II
Description: The Cleveland Indians are now a World Series contender. But last year's hunger is now replaced with complacency, and bad decisions by the team's new owner Roger Dorn threaten to tear the team apart.

Title: 46. Blank Check
Description: After a bike accident, a young boy inadvertently gains possession of a check for $1 million and proceeds to spend it, unaware that the gangsters it belongs to are in pursuit.

Title: 47. Blown Away
Description: An Irish bomber escapes from prison and targets a member of the Boston bomb squad.

Title: 48. A Low Down Dirty Shame
Description: An ex-cop, now a private detective, takes on the search for the millions stolen by a drug lord.

Title: 49. In the Army Now
Description: Two misguided youths join the reserves to make some money for their entrepreneurial dreams. No sooner than they finish basic training are they called up to do their part to save the free world.

Title: 50. The Shawshank Redemption
Description: A banker convicted of uxoricide forms a friendship over a quarter century with a hardened convict, while maintaining his innocence and trying to remain hopeful through simple compassion.

Title: 51. Drop Zone
Description: A tough cop teams up with a professional skydiver to capture a renegade computer hacker on the run from the law.

Title: 52. Guarding Tess
Description: A former U.S. First Lady wants a particular Secret Service agent to head her bodyguard detail, even though he can't stand her.

Title: 53. I.Q.
Description: A mechanic romances the mathematician niece of physicist Albert Einstein, with help from him and his friends.

Title: 54. My Father the Hero
Description: A teenage girl on vacation in the Bahamas with her divorced father tries to impress a potential boyfriend by saying that her father is actually her lover.

Title: 55. Wyatt Earp
Description: From Wichita to Dodge City, to the O.K. Corral in Tombstone, a man becomes a myth in this thrilling journey of romance, adventure, and desperate heroic action.

Title: 56. Quiz Show
Description: A young lawyer, Richard Goodwin, investigates a potentially fixed game show. Charles Van Doren, a big time show winner, is under Goodwin's investigation.

Title: 57. Renaissance Man
Description: A failed businessman is hired by the army to teach a group of underachieving recruits in order to help them pass basic training.

Title: 58. Blue Chips
Description: A college basketball coach is forced to break the rules in order to get the players he needs to stay competitive.

Title: 59. Don Juan DeMarco
Description: A psychiatrist must cure a young patient who presents himself as Don Juan, the world's greatest lover.

Title: 60. Frankenstein
Description: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

Title: 61. The Postman
Description: A simple Italian postman learns to love poetry while delivering mail to a famous poet, and then uses this to woo local beauty Beatrice.

Title: 62. Intersection
Description: While driving on a remote highway, indecisive architect Vincent Eastman is torn between reuniting with his estranged frigid calculating wife Sally or taking up with his lover Olivia Marshak, a magazine writer.

Title: 63. The Air Up There
Description: A basketball coach travels to Africa to recruit a new star.

Title: 64. Iron Will
Description: A brave young man is thrust into adulthood as he and his courageous team of sled dogs embark on a grueling and treacherous cross-country marathon.

Title: 65. Reality Bites
Description: A documentary filmmaker and her fellow Generation X graduates face life after college, looking for work and love in Houston.

Title: 66. Jason's Lyric
Description: Two brothers, survivors of family tragedy, take different life paths: one falls for a high-spirited waitress and dreams of success, the other follows a life of petty crime. Their lives reconnect in shattering fashion.

Title: 67. Speechless
Description: Two political speechwriters fall in love before they find out they are working for candidates on opposite sides.

Title: 68. The Cowboy Way
Description: Two childhood friends who are rodeo cowboys travel from New Mexico to New York City searching for a friend who disappeared while looking for his daughter, who's just been smuggled into the US from Cuba.

Title: 69. Corrina, Corrina
Description: In 1959, a widower hires a warm-hearted housekeeper/nanny to care for his seven-year-old daughter.

Title: 70. Only You
Description: As a teen, Faith was told that her destiny is a man named Damon Bradley. Years later, when she's about to marry someone else, a Damon Bradley calls to wish them well, and Faith blows off her wedding to follow Damon to Italy.

Title: 71. With Honors
Description: Convinced his thesis will have him graduate with honors from Harvard University, a stuffy student finds himself at the mercy of a homeless man's demands when he holds the papers hostage.

Title: 72. Color of Night
Description: A color-blind psychoanalyst is stalked by an unknown killer after taking over his murdered friend's therapy group, all of whom have a connection to a mysterious young woman that he begins having intense sexual encounters with.

Title: 73. 8 Seconds
Description: This movie chronicles the life of Lane Frost, 1987 PRCA Bull Riding World Champion, his marriage and his friendships with Tuff Hedeman (three-time World Champion) and Cody Lambert.

Title: 74. L√©on: The Professional
Description: 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by L√©on, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his prot√©g√©e and learns the assassin's trade.

Title: 75. Little Giants
Description: Misfits form their own opposing team to an elite peewee football team, coached by the elite team coach's brother.

Title: 76. House Party 3
Description: Kid, after a lifetime 'playing the field', is about to get married. 'Play' plans to throw the best bachelor party ever - until 'Kid's' three wise-crackin' nephews come to town, intent on showing them what parties are all about.

Title: 77. Getting Even with Dad
Description: A thief's son cons his father into spending more time with him.

Title: 78. Love Affair
Description: Two people meet on a flight to Sydney. Although both are engaged to others, they fall in love during their evacuation after a forced landing, and agree to meet in New York City three months later if the attraction lasts.

Title: 79. Milk Money
Description: A group of young boys befriend a prostitute named V.

Title: 80. New Nightmare
Description: A demonic force has chosen Freddy Krueger as its portal to the real world. Can Heather Langenkamp play the part of Nancy one last time and trap the evil trying to enter our world?

Title: 81. My Girl 2
Description: Vada Sultenfuss must go to LA to stay with her Uncle Phil to do some research on her mother's life, but finds much more.

Title: 82. Miracle on 34th Street
Description: A lawyer and a little girl must prove that a man claiming to be Santa Claus is the real thing.

Title: 83. The War
Description: A Vietnam veteran helps his kids battle over a tree house while recovering from his traumatic war experience.

Title: 84. Baby's Day Out
Description: After three kidnappers lose the baby they have kidnapped, both the cops and kidnappers go looking for the baby.

Title: 85. Lightning Jack
Description: Lightning Jack Kane is an Australian outlaw in the wild west. During a bungled bank robbery he picks up mute Ben Doyle as a hostage. The two become good friends, with Jack teaching Ben how to rob banks, while they plan Jack's last heist.

Title: 86. Andre
Description: The true story of how a seal named Andre befriended a little girl named Toni and her family in 1962.

Title: 87. Terminal Velocity
Description: A maverick skydiver and a former KGB agent team up to stop the Russian mafia from stealing gold.

Title: 88. Monkey Trouble
Description: A young girl's life turns hairy when her new pet monkey turns out to be a trained pickpocket on the run from a scheming gypsy.

Title: 89. Above the Rim
Description: Story of a promising high school basketball star and his relationships with two brothers, one a drug dealer and the other a former basketball star fallen on hard times and now employed as a security guard.

Title: 90. The Getaway
Description: An ex-con and his devoted wife must flee from danger when a heist doesn't go as planned.

Title: 91. No Escape
Description: A soldier convicted for murdering his commanding officer is dumped and left to die on a prison island inhabited by two camps of convicts.

Title: 92. Bad Girls
Description: Four prostitutes join together to travel the Old West.

Title: 93. The Madness of King George
Description: When King George III goes mad, his Lieutenants try to adjust the rules to run the country without his participation.

Title: 94. Muriel's Wedding
Description: A young social outcast in Australia steals money from her parents to finance a vacation where she hopes to find happiness, and perhaps love.

Title: 95. Threesome
Description: A girl named Alex is by mistake housed with 2 guys, Stuart and Eddy, in a college dorm suite. After initial problems they become friends. Stuart has the hots for Alex, Alex for Eddy and Eddy for Stuart. Can it work?

Title: 96. The Pagemaster
Description: A cowardly boy, who buries himself in accident statistics, enters a library to escape a storm, only to be transformed into an animated illustration by the Pagemaster. He has to work through obstacles from classic books to return to real-life.

Title: 97. Crooklyn
Description: Spike Lee's vibrant semi-autobiographical portrait of a school teacher, her stubborn jazz musician husband and their five kids living in Brooklyn in 1973.

Title: 98. Bullets Over Broadway
Description: In New York in 1928, a struggling playwright is forced to cast a mobster's talentless girlfriend in his latest drama in order to get it produced.

Title: 99. Greedy
Description: Rich, old uncle Joe is surrounded by relatives waiting/hoping for him to die while trying to look good and backstabbing the competition. What should he do?

Title: 100. Highlander: The Final Dimension
Description: Deceived that he had won the Prize, Connor MacLeod awakens from a peaceful life when an entombed immortal magician comes seeking the Highlander.
